info.name: Tumblr Dashboard Cursor - Dirk's head (Homestuck)
info.description: A cursor of Dirk's decaptitated head from Homestuck. Art from http://feastings.tumblr.com/post/26928965393/do-you-think-you-could-make-a-headless-dirk-dirks-head
info.additionalInfo: This cursor is tumblr only but if you want to make it your cursor for everything (on your browser) then remove the @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/') in the CSS
